# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a new description of the conversion from YpCbCr to ARGB.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

You don’t directly instantiate a [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vImage_YpCbCrToARGB] struct; use [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vImageConvert_YpCbCrToARGB_GenerateConversion(_:_:_:_:_:_:)] to generate a conversion matrix.

## Initializers

- **init(opaque:)**: Creates a new description of the conversion from YpCbCr to ARGB from the specfied bytes.
